timeline.bodyText:
I wonder about the possibility to have an enum here with at least:

CONVERGED
MAX_ITERATION_REACHED
SOLVER_FAILED: I am not sure about the meaning
NO_CALCULATION
Hades2 has a status that says if the result is realist or not. I think we don't need it because limit violations detection should be in the post processing.
timeline.author: annetill

replies.bodyText: I would keep a string as status set could be different between loadflow implementations
replies.author: geofjamg

replies.bodyText: Thinking again, maybe you are right... if we want to rely on status to build more high level workflows we have to define all possible statuses.
replies.author: geofjamg

replies.bodyText: Result not realist means we have converged to a state with very low voltages so outside by default [0.8, 1.2]. I think we should keep it.
replies.author: geofjamg
